sentences.sentence: The grant helped defray the expenses of the trip.
sentences.translation: 补助金帮助支付旅行费用。

sentences.sentence: We defray this charge when you pay your sundry fees bill.
sentences.translation: 在您付杂费的同时我们要支付这笔费用。

sentences.sentence: His bunkhouse vacations help defray the expense of two summer ranch hands.
sentences.translation: 他的农舍之旅可以帮他支付两个夏季牧场的人工费用。
